reviews.review_msg: Very boring lecturer...always goes on about things that make you fall asleep...for paper he didn't even tell you a clear idea of how or what to write yet marked it hard...for a crim major I would advise skipping him just because you don't really learn what you want since it can be quite boring
He was a very hard marker for the papers that were assigned. He was very unclear to the criteria for the papers. Furthermore class lectures were not organized or stimulating.

This guy knows his stuff! He has that rare quality in university of not subscribing to the far left for it's own sake. He gives all arguments their due. And he tells facinating stories in class, as he has loads of real experience in criminal law. MARKS HARD! You can't trick this guy.
